decolorization result: distinct color change from blue to violet
any additional information: Capable of decolorizing at higher concentrations with acclimatization.
Thin layer chromatography showed reduction in chromophore intensity.
Adequate decolorization for combination of dyes.

type of fungi: R. erythropolis SQ1 and M. smegmatis mc2 155
any additional information: Results compared to A. orientalis SY6.
